issues.message: Rename event handler 'OK_Button_Click' to match the regular expression: '^(([a-z][a-z0-9]*)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?_)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?$'.
Rename event handler 'bwBuildHTML_DoWork' to match the regular expression: '^(([a-z][a-z0-9]*)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?_)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?$'.
Rename event handler 'bwBuildHTML_ProgressChanged' to match the regular expression: '^(([a-z][a-z0-9]*)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?_)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?$'.
Rename event handler 'OK_Button_Click' to match the regular expression: '^(([a-z][a-z0-9]*)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?_)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?$'.
Rename event handler 'Cancel_Button_Click' to match the regular expression: '^(([a-z][a-z0-9]*)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?_)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?$'.
